awd_abstract_narration:
The Civil, Mechanical and Manufacturing Innovation division of NSF is continually exploring how to best execute its mission through supporting high impact research. Roadmapping efforts support research leadership and vision scoping. Through this grant, Nexight supports a roadmapping effort by providing planning, facilitation, and development support. Nexight directly facilitates the roadmapping workshop and documents findings. The ultimate result of this work enables the division to be effectively aligned and focused to best fulfill its charge.

The specific activity includes a multi-day workshop with broad participation from division program officers and staff.

This award reflects NSF's statutory mission and has been deemed worthy of support through evaluation using the Foundation's intellectual merit and broader impacts review criteria.
org_div_long_name: Division of Civil, Mechanical, and Manufacturing Innovation

por.por_cntn:
The U.S. National Science Foundation’s (NSF) Civil, Mechanical and Manufacturing Innovation (CMMI) Division held an off-site retreat on February 14 and 15 to collaboratively identify how the division can best serve its stakeholders, including academia, taxpayers, NSF, and more. The retreat included topics, such as current challenges, gaps, and opportunities for CMMI’s clusters, changing the division’s name to incorporate systems, future technology areas of interest, and potential changes to programs and solicitations.

Actions resulting from these discussions will benefit staff within the CMMI Division as well as CMMI’s stakeholders and project awardees, including the development of a comprehensive, coordinated communication and outreach plan to best help those interested in division programs and those submitting proposals. Actions will also benefit NSF as a whole and other divisions within NSF, as CMMI shares successes, challenges, opportunities, and gaps within multiple areas of the division.

Based on discussions during the roadmapping retreat, the CMMI Division staff identified next steps and operational action items, including initial staff leads and deadlines. The division will revisit these action items to ensure necessary leads and deadlines are identified and modify and/or remove action items that are not a priority based on the direction of the division and NSF.

 


Last Modified: 09/30/2024
Modified by: Norah Schneider
